source.name: 30 Corporations that Paid More for Lobbying than Federal Income Taxes (3-Year Totals 2008-2010)
source.description:
Size of marker denotes amount spent in lobbying from 2008-2010 
Based on data from "￼For Hire: Lobbyists or the 99%? How Corporations Pay More for Lobbyists Than in Taxes"
A report by Public Campaign December 2011
